location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Evelyn Baring, Governor General's Camp, Lucknow to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Captain Henry Byam Abbott being gazetted as Assistant Political Agent Third Class; Aitchison looking into whether or not there is a further vacancy; and Lord Northbrook's desire to appoint a civilian to replace Captain Victor Edward Law.A postscript to the letter informs Pelly that Colonel Thomas Dennehy will be gazetted as soon as his papers come through.
